description: The less you know about IT FOLLOWS, the better. You should know its borrows from the best—Spielberg's JAWS, Carpenter's HALLOWEEN, Nakata's RINGU, Cronenberg's THEY CAME FROM WITHIN—but like all good lendees, it takes what it borrows and builds something entirely new.
synopsis: After an innocent sexual encounter with her boyfriend, a teenager is stalked by an increasingly evil force in the year's smartest and scariest horror film.
title: It Follows
